Description: Standard production class. This class consists of affordable passenger cars. Car class designates a car's performance level by taking into account grip, weight, and power.
Sport production class. This includes sports oriented saloons. Car class designates a car's performance level by taking into account grip, weight, and power.
Sport-performance production class. This includes sports oriented coups. Car class designates a car's performance level by taking into account grip, weight, and power.
Performance production class. Here is where you will find the high end sports cars. Car class designates a car's performance level by taking into account grip, weight, and power.
High performance production class. Supercars and exotics. Car class designates a car's performance level by taking into account grip, weight, and power.

Ultra high performance production class. This is the unlimited class. This has the rarest cars in the world. Car class designates a car's performance level by taking into account grip, weight, and power.
Heavily modified production cars. Car class designates a car's performance level by taking into account grip, weight, and power.
Ultra-ultra high end, purpose-built race cars.
